name: World Stadium 4
overview: World Stadium 4 is the fourth game in Playstation of the World Stadium series. This version of the game features new game modes and the Pocketstation feature that allow the player to create his own characters, play mini games and bring two friends to play with each other. The game features a lot of different modes even a music composser in which the player can select where to put the different notes and then listen to the melodies. Game Modes: - VS Mode: Play against another human player or against the computer. - Season Mode: Choose a team and play a season. - Free Mode: Create a tournament choosing 6 different teams and try to win the cup. - Mini games: Choose a character and play different mini games of batting, throwing, etc. There is a new feature of vs party that will be unlocked playing the rest of the game. - Training Mode: This mode lets the player practice batting, throwing and catching. The game also features other game modes that will be unlocked playing the main modes.
